item.title: Could 2017 be the year of indie?
item.author: Felix Editor,Joseph O' Connell-Dannes,
item.description: Last year, was almost unquestionably the year of hip-hop; the genre saw a huge influx of new artists and the drop of some absolutely massive albums from established names (From Chance the Rapper’s Colouring Book and A Tribe Called Quest’s We Got It From Here… Thank You 4 Your Service to Kendrick …
